game.title: The Quest for the Lost Amulet
game.objective: Uncover the hidden amulet and prove your worth to the ancient king.
game.description: A quest of adventure and power, the amulet's discovery holds great riches and knowledge.
game.reward: Upon completion, you shall receive the amulet along with a chest filled with gold coins.

task.objective: Trace the ancient texts in the royal library for clues.
task.description: A hidden passage may lead to the palace's entrance. Beware of magical traps.

task.objective: Uncover the map to the tomb's location in the archives.
task.description: The entrance is likely marked by an old tapestry. Look for a hidden room.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian snake guarding the entrance.
task.description: A test of courage and stealth is required to pass this challenge.
task.location: The guarded path, near the snake grove

task.objective: Enter the tomb and find the amulet within its chambers.
task.description: Use your wit to navigate the maze and avoid traps on your way.
task.location: Tomb chamber, marked with a mysterious symbol
